creator: King
descriptionHtml:
Farm Heroes Saga, from the makers of Candy Crush Soda Saga & Bubble Witch 3 Saga!

Rancid the Racoon is trying to spoil the precious Farm Lands, stealing as many Cropsies as he can along the way. Join forces with the Farm Heroes and help collect the Cropsies to save the day! Play through hundreds of levels solving puzzles by switching, matching and collecting Cropsies across the farm!

Match 3 or more Cropsies to collect them, plan your moves for bigger and better matches to reach that all important high score! Explore farmtastic adventures across a variety of game modes and puzzles including Rancid boss battles!

Farm Heroes Saga has a wealth of boosters and power ups to help you out along the way! Make the most of Hero Mode when you have moves to spare, Hero Mode lets you earn extra points which makes those big matches even more worthwhile!

Farm Heroes Saga features:
● Collect all kinds of Cropsies to win the level before you run out of moves
● Relaxing match 3 gameplay
● Hero Mode: Earn extra points when you have moves to spare!
● Play levels and win magic beans to help you activate Farm Club
● Reach for the stars in the Tractor Dash, challenge friends to collect stars for rewards
● Rechargeable boosters, special power ups and Farm Club animals to help you win those challenging levels
● Easy to play but challenging to master
● Acres of luscious levels and puzzles to complete - more added every 2 weeks!

Take on this epic saga alone or play with friends to see who can get the highest score!

Easily sync the game between devices and access full game features when connected to the internet

Farm Heroes Saga is free to play but optional in-game items require payment. You can turn off the payment feature by disabling in-app purchases in your device’s settings.

By downloading this game you are agreeing to our terms of service which can be found at https://king.com/termsAndConditions

Visit https://care.king.com/ or contact us in game by going to Settings > Customer Care if you need help!

Facebook @FarmHeroesSaga
Twitter @FarmHeroes
Instagram @FarmHeroesSaga
YouTube @FarmHeroesOfficial

Start matching and collecting Cropsies today! But most importantly have fun playing Farm Heroes Saga!

Do not sell my data: King shares your personal information with advertising partners to personalize ads. Learn more at https://king.com/privacyPolicy. If you wish to exercise your Do Not Sell My Data rights, you can do so by contacting us via the in game help centre or by going to https://soporto.king.com/

Rancid the Racoon is trying to spoil the precious Farm Lands, stealing as many Cropsies as he can along the way. Join forces with the Farm Heroes and help collect the Cropsies to save the day! Play through hundreds of levels solving puzzles by switching, matching and collecting Cropsies across the farm!

Match 3 or more Cropsies to collect them, plan your moves for bigger and better matches to reach that all important high score! Explore farmtastic adventures across a variety of game modes and puzzles including Rancid boss battles!

Farm Heroes Saga has a wealth of boosters and power ups to help you out along the way! Make the most of Hero Mode when you have moves to spare, Hero Mode lets you earn extra points which makes those big matches even more worthwhile!

Farm Heroes Saga features:
● Collect all kinds of Cropsies to win the level before you run out of moves
● Relaxing match 3 gameplay
● Hero Mode: Earn extra points when you have moves to spare!
● Play levels and win magic beans to help you activate Farm Club
● Reach for the stars in the Tractor Dash, challenge friends to collect stars for rewards
● Rechargeable boosters, special power ups and Farm Club animals to help you win those challenging levels
● Easy to play but challenging to master
● Acres of luscious levels and puzzles to complete - more added every 2 weeks!

Take on this epic saga alone or play with friends to see who can get the highest score!

Easily sync the game between devices and access full game features when connected to the internet

Farm Heroes Saga is free to play but optional in-game items require payment. You can turn off the payment feature by disabling in-app purchases in your device’s settings.

By downloading this game you are agreeing to our terms of service which can be found at https://king.com/termsAndConditions

Visit https://care.king.com/ or contact us in game by going to Settings > Customer Care if you need help!

Facebook @FarmHeroesSaga
Twitter @FarmHeroes
Instagram @FarmHeroesSaga
YouTube @FarmHeroesOfficial

Start matching and collecting Cropsies today! But most importantly have fun playing Farm Heroes Saga!

Do not sell my data: King shares your personal information with advertising partners to personalize ads. Learn more at https://king.com/privacyPolicy. If you wish to exercise your Do Not Sell My Data rights, you can do so by contacting us via the in game help centre or by going to https://soporto.king.com/

Aragon Business Centre, Level 4, Dragonara Road, St Julians STJ3140, Malta

creator: King
descriptionHtml:
Farm Heroes Saga, from the makers of Candy Crush Soda Saga & Bubble Witch 3 Saga!

Rancid the Racoon is trying to spoil the precious Farm Lands, stealing as many Cropsies as he can along the way. Join forces with the Farm Heroes and help collect the Cropsies to save the day! Play through hundreds of levels solving puzzles by switching, matching and collecting Cropsies across the farm!

Match 3 or more Cropsies to collect them, plan your moves for bigger and better matches to reach that all important high score! Explore farmtastic adventures across a variety of game modes and puzzles including Rancid boss battles!

Farm Heroes Saga has a wealth of boosters and power ups to help you out along the way! Make the most of Hero Mode when you have moves to spare, Hero Mode lets you earn extra points which makes those big matches even more worthwhile!

Farm Heroes Saga features:
● Collect all kinds of Cropsies to win the level before you run out of moves
● Relaxing match 3 gameplay
● Hero Mode: Earn extra points when you have moves to spare!
● Play levels and win magic beans to help you activate Farm Club
● Reach for the stars in the Tractor Dash, challenge friends to collect stars for rewards
● Rechargeable boosters, special power ups and Farm Club animals to help you win those challenging levels
● Easy to play but challenging to master
● Acres of luscious levels and puzzles to complete - more added every 2 weeks!

Take on this epic saga alone or play with friends to see who can get the highest score!

Easily sync the game between devices and access full game features when connected to the internet

Farm Heroes Saga is free to play but optional in-game items require payment. You can turn off the payment feature by disabling in-app purchases in your device’s settings.

By downloading this game you are agreeing to our terms of service which can be found at https://king.com/termsAndConditions

Visit https://care.king.com/ or contact us in game by going to Settings > Customer Care if you need help!

Facebook @FarmHeroesSaga
Twitter @FarmHeroes
Instagram @FarmHeroesSaga
YouTube @FarmHeroesOfficial

Start matching and collecting Cropsies today! But most importantly have fun playing Farm Heroes Saga!

Do not sell my data: King shares your personal information with advertising partners to personalize ads. Learn more at https://king.com/privacyPolicy. If you wish to exercise your Do Not Sell My Data rights, you can do so by contacting us via the in game help centre or by going to https://soporto.king.com/
descriptionShort: Solve puzzles & collect Cropsies in this fun, farmtastic match 3 adventure!

title: Farm Heroes Saga

container.value:
King.com Limited
Aragon Business Centre, Level 4, Dragonara Road, St Julians STJ3140, Malta

creator: King
descriptionHtml:
Farm Heroes Saga, from the makers of Candy Crush Soda Saga & Bubble Witch 3 Saga!

Rancid the Racoon is trying to spoil the precious Farm Lands, stealing as many Cropsies as he can along the way. Join forces with the Farm Heroes and help collect the Cropsies to save the day! Play through hundreds of levels solving puzzles by switching, matching and collecting Cropsies across the farm!

Match 3 or more Cropsies to collect them, plan your moves for bigger and better matches to reach that all important high score! Explore farmtastic adventures across a variety of game modes and puzzles including Rancid boss battles!

Farm Heroes Saga has a wealth of boosters and power ups to help you out along the way! Make the most of Hero Mode when you have moves to spare, Hero Mode lets you earn extra points which makes those big matches even more worthwhile!

Farm Heroes Saga features:
● Collect all kinds of Cropsies to win the level before you run out of moves
● Relaxing match 3 gameplay
● Hero Mode: Earn extra points when you have moves to spare!
● Play levels and win magic beans to help you activate Farm Club
● Reach for the stars in the Tractor Dash, challenge friends to collect stars for rewards
● Rechargeable boosters, special power ups and Farm Club animals to help you win those challenging levels
● Easy to play but challenging to master
● Acres of luscious levels and puzzles to complete - more added every 2 weeks!

Take on this epic saga alone or play with friends to see who can get the highest score!

Easily sync the game between devices and access full game features when connected to the internet

Farm Heroes Saga is free to play but optional in-game items require payment. You can turn off the payment feature by disabling in-app purchases in your device’s settings.

By downloading this game you are agreeing to our terms of service which can be found at https://king.com/termsAndConditions

Visit https://care.king.com/ or contact us in game by going to Settings > Customer Care if you need help!

Facebook @FarmHeroesSaga
Twitter @FarmHeroes
Instagram @FarmHeroesSaga
YouTube @FarmHeroesOfficial

Start matching and collecting Cropsies today! But most importantly have fun playing Farm Heroes Saga!

Do not sell my data: King shares your personal information with advertising partners to personalize ads. Learn more at https://king.com/privacyPolicy. If you wish to exercise your Do Not Sell My Data rights, you can do so by contacting us via the in game help centre or by going to https://soporto.king.com/
descriptionShort: Solve puzzles & collect Cropsies in this fun, farmtastic match 3 adventure!

Aragon Business Centre, Level 4, Dragonara Road, St Julians STJ3140, Malta

creator: King
descriptionHtml:
Farm Heroes Saga, from the makers of Candy Crush Soda Saga & Bubble Witch 3 Saga!

Rancid the Racoon is trying to spoil the precious Farm Lands, stealing as many Cropsies as he can along the way. Join forces with the Farm Heroes and help collect the Cropsies to save the day! Play through hundreds of levels solving puzzles by switching, matching and collecting Cropsies across the farm!

Match 3 or more Cropsies to collect them, plan your moves for bigger and better matches to reach that all important high score! Explore farmtastic adventures across a variety of game modes and puzzles including Rancid boss battles!

Farm Heroes Saga has a wealth of boosters and power ups to help you out along the way! Make the most of Hero Mode when you have moves to spare, Hero Mode lets you earn extra points which makes those big matches even more worthwhile!

Take on this fantastic Saga alone or play with friends to see who can get the highest score and compete to become number 1!

Farm Heroes Saga is completely free to play but some optional in-game items will require payment.

By downloading this game you are agreeing to our terms of service; http://about.king.com/consumer-terms/terms

Farm Heroes Saga features:
● Collect all kinds of Cropsies to win the level before you run out of moves
● Relaxing match 3 gameplay
● Hero Mode: Earn extra points when you have moves to spare!
● Play levels and win magic beans to help you activate Farm Club
● Reach for the stars in the Tractor Dash, challenge friends to collect stars for rewards
● Rechargeable boosters, special power ups and Farm Club animals to help you win those challenging levels
● Easy to play but challenging to master
● Acres of luscious levels and puzzles to complete - more added every 2 weeks!
● Leaderboards to watch your friends and competitors!
● Easily sync the game between devices and unlock full game features when connected to the internet

Visit https://care.king.com/ or contact us in game by going to Settings > Customer Care if you need help!

Follow us to get news and updates:
facebook.com/FarmHeroes
Twitter @FarmHeroesSaga
youtube.com/user/FarmHeroesOfficial
farmheroessaga.com

Start matching and collecting Cropsies today! But most importantly have fun playing Farm Heroes Saga!
descriptionShort: Solve puzzles & collect Cropsies in this fun, farmtastic match 3 adventure!

Farm Heroes Saga, from the makers of Candy Crush Soda Saga & Bubble Witch 3 Saga!

Rancid the Racoon is trying to spoil the precious Farm Lands, stealing as many Cropsies as he can along the way. Join forces with the Farm Heroes and help collect the Cropsies to save the day! Play through hundreds of levels solving puzzles by switching, matching and collecting Cropsies across the farm!

Match 3 or more Cropsies to collect them, plan your moves for bigger and better matches to reach that all important high score! Explore farmtastic adventures across a variety of game modes and puzzles including Rancid boss battles!

Farm Heroes Saga has a wealth of boosters and power ups to help you out along the way! Make the most of Hero Mode when you have moves to spare, Hero Mode lets you earn extra points which makes those big matches even more worthwhile!

Take on this fantastic Saga alone or play with friends to see who can get the highest score and compete to become number 1!

Farm Heroes Saga is completely free to play but some optional in-game items will require payment.

By downloading this game you are agreeing to our terms of service; http://about.king.com/consumer-terms/terms

Farm Heroes Saga features:
● Collect all kinds of Cropsies to win the level before you run out of moves
● Relaxing match 3 gameplay
● Hero Mode: Earn extra points when you have moves to spare!
● Play levels and win magic beans to help you activate Farm Club
● Reach for the stars in the Tractor Dash, challenge friends to collect stars for rewards
● Rechargeable boosters, special power ups and Farm Club animals to help you win those challenging levels
● Easy to play but challenging to master
● Acres of luscious levels and puzzles to complete - more added every 2 weeks!
● Leaderboards to watch your friends and competitors!
● Easily sync the game between devices and unlock full game features when connected to the internet

Visit https://care.king.com/ or contact us in game by going to Settings > Customer Care if you need help!

Follow us to get news and updates:
facebook.com/FarmHeroes
Twitter @FarmHeroesSaga
youtube.com/user/FarmHeroesOfficial
farmheroessaga.com

Start matching and collecting Cropsies today! But most importantly have fun playing Farm Heroes Saga!

Match 3 or more Cropsies to collect them, plan your moves for bigger and better matches to reach that all important high score! Explore farmtastic adventures across a variety of game modes and puzzles including Rancid boss battles!

Farm Heroes Saga has a wealth of boosters and power ups to help you out along the way! Make the most of Hero Mode when you have moves to spare, Hero Mode lets you earn extra points which makes those big matches even more worthwhile!

Farm Heroes Saga features:
● Collect all kinds of Cropsies to win the level before you run out of moves
● Relaxing match 3 gameplay
● Hero Mode: Earn extra points when you have moves to spare!
● Play levels and win magic beans to help you activate Farm Club
● Reach for the stars in the Tractor Dash, challenge friends to collect stars for rewards
● Rechargeable boosters, special power ups and Farm Club animals to help you win those challenging levels
● Easy to play but challenging to master
● Acres of luscious levels and puzzles to complete - more added every 2 weeks!

Take on this epic saga alone or play with friends to see who can get the highest score!

Easily sync the game between devices and access full game features when connected to the internet

Farm Heroes Saga is free to play but optional in-game items require payment. You can turn off the payment feature by disabling in-app purchases in your device’s settings.

title: Farm Heroes Saga

container.value:
King.com Limited
Aragon Business Centre, Level 4, Dragonara Road, St Julians STJ3140, Malta

creator: King
descriptionHtml:
Farm Heroes Saga, from the makers of Candy Crush Soda Saga & Bubble Witch 3 Saga!

Rancid the Racoon is trying to spoil the precious Farm Lands, stealing as many Cropsies as he can along the way. Join forces with the Farm Heroes and help collect the Cropsies to save the day! Play through hundreds of levels solving puzzles by switching, matching and collecting Cropsies across the farm!

Match 3 or more Cropsies to collect them, plan your moves for bigger and better matches to reach that all important high score! Explore farmtastic adventures across a variety of game modes and puzzles including Rancid boss battles!

Farm Heroes Saga has a wealth of boosters and power ups to help you out along the way! Make the most of Hero Mode when you have moves to spare, Hero Mode lets you earn extra points which makes those big matches even more worthwhile!

Farm Heroes Saga features:
● Collect all kinds of Cropsies to win the level before you run out of moves
● Relaxing match 3 gameplay
● Hero Mode: Earn extra points when you have moves to spare!
● Play levels and win magic beans to help you activate Farm Club
● Reach for the stars in the Tractor Dash, challenge friends to collect stars for rewards
● Rechargeable boosters, special power ups and Farm Club animals to help you win those challenging levels
● Easy to play but challenging to master
● Acres of luscious levels and puzzles to complete - more added every 2 weeks!

Take on this epic saga alone or play with friends to see who can get the highest score!

Easily sync the game between devices and access full game features when connected to the internet

Farm Heroes Saga is free to play but optional in-game items require payment. You can turn off the payment feature by disabling in-app purchases in your device’s settings.

By downloading this game you are agreeing to our terms of service which can be found at https://king.com/termsAndConditions

Visit https://care.king.com/ or contact us in game by going to Settings > Customer Care if you need help!

Facebook @FarmHeroesSaga
Twitter @FarmHeroes
Instagram @FarmHeroesSaga
YouTube @FarmHeroesOfficial

Start matching and collecting Cropsies today! But most importantly have fun playing Farm Heroes Saga!

Do not sell my data: King shares your personal information with advertising partners to personalize ads. Learn more at https://king.com/privacyPolicy. If you wish to exercise your Do Not Sell My Data rights, you can do so by contacting us via the in game help centre or by going to https://soporto.king.com/
descriptionShort: Solve puzzles & collect Cropsies in this fun, farmtastic match 3 adventure!

appDetails.developerAddress:
King.com Limited
Aragon Business Centre, Level 4, Dragonara Road, St Julians STJ3140, Malta
appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Sigh, Rancid the Troublemaker has been causing problems again! You and your Cropsies will be fine though! Just ignore him and update your app to discover all the farmtastic new levels!

Aragon Business Centre, Level 4, Dragonara Road, St Julians STJ3140, Malta

creator: King
descriptionHtml:
Farm Heroes Saga, from the makers of Candy Crush Soda Saga & Bubble Witch 3 Saga!

Rancid the Racoon is trying to spoil the precious Farm Lands, stealing as many Cropsies as he can along the way. Join forces with the Farm Heroes and help collect the Cropsies to save the day! Play through hundreds of levels solving puzzles by switching, matching and collecting Cropsies across the farm!

Match 3 or more Cropsies to collect them, plan your moves for bigger and better matches to reach that all important high score! Explore farmtastic adventures across a variety of game modes and puzzles including Rancid boss battles!

Farm Heroes Saga has a wealth of boosters and power ups to help you out along the way! Make the most of Hero Mode when you have moves to spare, Hero Mode lets you earn extra points which makes those big matches even more worthwhile!

Farm Heroes Saga features:
● Collect all kinds of Cropsies to win the level before you run out of moves
● Relaxing match 3 gameplay
● Hero Mode: Earn extra points when you have moves to spare!
● Play levels and win magic beans to help you activate Farm Club
● Reach for the stars in the Tractor Dash, challenge friends to collect stars for rewards
● Rechargeable boosters, special power ups and Farm Club animals to help you win those challenging levels
● Easy to play but challenging to master
● Acres of luscious levels and puzzles to complete - more added every 2 weeks!

Take on this epic saga alone or play with friends to see who can get the highest score!

Easily sync the game between devices and access full game features when connected to the internet

Farm Heroes Saga is free to play but optional in-game items require payment. You can turn off the payment feature by disabling in-app purchases in your device’s settings.

By downloading this game you are agreeing to our terms of service which can be found at https://king.com/termsAndConditions

Visit https://care.king.com/ or contact us in game by going to Settings > Customer Care if you need help!

Facebook @FarmHeroesSaga
Twitter @FarmHeroes
Instagram @FarmHeroesSaga
YouTube @FarmHeroesOfficial

Start matching and collecting Cropsies today! But most importantly have fun playing Farm Heroes Saga!

Do not sell my data: King shares your personal information with advertising partners to personalize ads. Learn more at https://king.com/privacyPolicy. If you wish to exercise your Do Not Sell My Data rights, you can do so by contacting us via the in game help centre or by going to https://soporto.king.com/
descriptionShort: Solve puzzles & collect Cropsies in this fun, farmtastic match 3 adventure!

appDetails.developerAddress:
King.com Limited
Aragon Business Centre, Level 4, Dragonara Road, St Julians STJ3140, Malta
appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Yeehaw, It's all fixed! Just update your app to play the new farmtastic levels! Thanks for your patience! And remember to never give up if Rancid or other troublemakers try to make life hard for you!

Match 3 or more Cropsies to collect them, plan your moves for bigger and better matches to reach that all important high score! Explore farmtastic adventures across a variety of game modes and puzzles including Rancid boss battles!

Farm Heroes Saga has a wealth of boosters and power ups to help you out along the way! Make the most of Hero Mode when you have moves to spare, Hero Mode lets you earn extra points which makes those big matches even more worthwhile!

● Rechargeable boosters, special power ups and Farm Club animals to help you win those challenging levels

creator: King
descriptionHtml:
Farm Heroes Saga, from the makers of Candy Crush Saga, Pet Rescue Saga, and Bubble Witch 3 Saga!

Farming has never been so fun! Jump into a farmtastic adventure: match and collect the cute Cropsies across the farm to solve the match 3 puzzles! Go from puzzle to puzzle, matching fruit and plants, and level up to save the farm from Rancid the Raccoon. Join forces with the Farm Heroes to swap, match, and collect Cropsies. Ready to defend the Farm Lands?

Enjoy the amazing farm and match 3 puzzle game from King! Match 3 or more Cropsies in a variety of game modes and puzzles. Unlock animals and blast boosters as you solve the different match 3 puzzles.

Explore 1000’s of Levels
Acres of luscious levels and puzzles await you! Every two weeks, discover new puzzles, for a match 3 game in constant evolution!

Hero Mode
Time for a blast! Match as many Cropsies as you can before running out of moves. The higher the score, the more Magic Beans you gain to help you win the puzzle game.

Rancid Boss Battles
Defend your farm! Solve challenging matching puzzles and, with the help of the farm animals, keep the thief away from your fruit and plants.

Join the Farm Club
Recruit cute animals to help you solve puzzles! When matching is not enough anymore, call your animal friends to the rescue and blast powerful boosters to win the game.

Play with friends…
Team up with your friends to enhance your farming experience: chat, play with them and participate in events unique to Farm Teams. Who said the farming adventure had to be lonely?

…or compete with friends!
You think your farm is the best? The game is on! Compete in the leaderboard or in the Tractor Dash event to prove you’re the best at match 3 puzzle games.

Start matching and farming Cropsies today! But most importantly, have fun playing Farm Heroes Saga!

Visit https://community.king.com/en or contact us in game by going to Settings > Customer Care if you need help!

Farm Heroes Saga is free to play but optional in-game items such as extra moves or lives require payment. You can turn off the payment feature by disabling in-app purchases in your device’s settings.

Farming has never been so fun! Jump into a farmtastic adventure: match and collect the cute Cropsies across the farm to solve the match 3 puzzles! Go from puzzle to puzzle, matching fruit and plants, and level up to save the farm from Rancid the Raccoon. Join forces with the Farm Heroes to swap, match, and collect Cropsies. Ready to defend the Farm Lands?

Enjoy the amazing farm and match 3 puzzle game from King! Match 3 or more Cropsies in a variety of game modes and puzzles. Unlock animals and blast boosters as you solve the different match 3 puzzles.

Explore 1000’s of Levels
Acres of luscious levels and puzzles await you! Every two weeks, discover new puzzles, for a match 3 game in constant evolution!

Hero Mode
Time for a blast! Match as many Cropsies as you can before running out of moves. The higher the score, the more Magic Beans you gain to help you win the puzzle game.

Rancid Boss Battles
Defend your farm! Solve challenging matching puzzles and, with the help of the farm animals, keep the thief away from your fruit and plants.

Join the Farm Club
Recruit cute animals to help you solve puzzles! When matching is not enough anymore, call your animal friends to the rescue and blast powerful boosters to win the game.

Play with friends…
Team up with your friends to enhance your farming experience: chat, play with them and participate in events unique to Farm Teams. Who said the farming adventure had to be lonely?

…or compete with friends!
You think your farm is the best? The game is on! Compete in the leaderboard or in the Tractor Dash event to prove you’re the best at match 3 puzzle games.

Start matching and farming Cropsies today! But most importantly, have fun playing Farm Heroes Saga!

Visit https://community.king.com/en or contact us in game by going to Settings > Customer Care if you need help!

Farm Heroes Saga is free to play but optional in-game items such as extra moves or lives require payment. You can turn off the payment feature by disabling in-app purchases in your device’s settings.

By downloading Farm Heroes Saga you agree to our terms of service which can be found at https://king.com/termsAndConditions

Do not sell my data: King shares your personal information with advertising partners to personalize ads. Learn more at https://king.com/privacyPolicy. If you wish to exercise your Do Not Sell My Data rights, you can do so by contacting us via the in-game help center or by going to https://soporto.king.com/contact

title: Farm Heroes Saga

container.value:
King.com Limited
Aragon Business Centre, Level 4, Dragonara Road, St Julians STJ3140, Malta

creator: King
descriptionHtml:
Farm Heroes Saga, from the makers of Candy Crush Soda Saga & Bubble Witch 3 Saga!

Rancid the Racoon is trying to spoil the precious Farm Lands, stealing as many Cropsies as he can along the way. Join forces with the Farm Heroes and help collect the Cropsies to save the day! Play through hundreds of levels solving puzzles by switching, matching and collecting Cropsies across the farm!

Match 3 or more Cropsies to collect them, plan your moves for bigger and better matches to reach that all important high score! Explore farmtastic adventures across a variety of game modes and puzzles including Rancid boss battles!

Farm Heroes Saga has a wealth of boosters and power ups to help you out along the way! Make the most of Hero Mode when you have moves to spare, Hero Mode lets you earn extra points which makes those big matches even more worthwhile!

Farm Heroes Saga features:
● Collect all kinds of Cropsies to win the level before you run out of moves
● Relaxing match 3 gameplay
● Hero Mode: Earn extra points when you have moves to spare!
● Play levels and win magic beans to help you activate Farm Club
● Reach for the stars in the Tractor Dash, challenge friends to collect stars for rewards
● Rechargeable boosters, special power ups and Farm Club animals to help you win those challenging levels
● Easy to play but challenging to master
● Acres of luscious levels and puzzles to complete - more added every 2 weeks!

Take on this epic saga alone or play with friends to see who can get the highest score!

Easily sync the game between devices and access full game features when connected to the internet

Farm Heroes Saga is free to play but optional in-game items require payment. You can turn off the payment feature by disabling in-app purchases in your device’s settings.

By downloading this game you are agreeing to our terms of service which can be found at https://king.com/termsAndConditions

Visit https://care.king.com/ or contact us in game by going to Settings > Customer Care if you need help!

Facebook @FarmHeroesSaga
Twitter @FarmHeroes
Instagram @FarmHeroesSaga
YouTube @FarmHeroesOfficial

Start matching and collecting Cropsies today! But most importantly have fun playing Farm Heroes Saga!

Do not sell my data: King shares your personal information with advertising partners to personalize ads. Learn more at https://king.com/privacyPolicy. If you wish to exercise your Do Not Sell My Data rights, you can do so by contacting us via the in game help centre or by going to https://soporto.king.com/

title: Farm Heroes Saga

container.value:
King.com Limited
Aragon Business Centre, Level 4, Dragonara Road, St Julians STJ3140, Malta

creator: King
descriptionHtml:
Farm Heroes Saga, from the makers of Candy Crush Saga, Pet Rescue Saga, and Bubble Witch 3 Saga!

Farming has never been so fun! Jump into a farmtastic adventure: match and collect the cute Cropsies across the farm to solve the match 3 puzzles! Go from puzzle to puzzle, matching fruit and plants, and level up to save the farm from Rancid the Raccoon. Join forces with the Farm Heroes to swap, match, and collect Cropsies. Ready to defend the Farm Lands?

Enjoy the amazing farm and match 3 puzzle game from King! Match 3 or more Cropsies in a variety of game modes and puzzles. Unlock animals and blast boosters as you solve the different match 3 puzzles.

Explore 1000’s of Levels
Acres of luscious levels and puzzles await you! Every two weeks, discover new puzzles, for a match 3 game in constant evolution!

Hero Mode
Time for a blast! Match as many Cropsies as you can before running out of moves. The higher the score, the more Magic Beans you gain to help you win the puzzle game.

Rancid Boss Battles
Defend your farm! Solve challenging matching puzzles and, with the help of the farm animals, keep the thief away from your fruit and plants.

Join the Farm Club
Recruit cute animals to help you solve puzzles! When matching is not enough anymore, call your animal friends to the rescue and blast powerful boosters to win the game.

Play with friends…
Team up with your friends to enhance your farming experience: chat, play with them and participate in events unique to Farm Teams. Who said the farming adventure had to be lonely?

…or compete with friends!
You think your farm is the best? The game is on! Compete in the leaderboard or in the Tractor Dash event to prove you’re the best at match 3 puzzle games.

Start matching and farming Cropsies today! But most importantly, have fun playing Farm Heroes Saga!

Visit https://community.king.com/en or contact us in game by going to Settings > Customer Care if you need help!

Farm Heroes Saga is free to play but optional in-game items such as extra moves or lives require payment. You can turn off the payment feature by disabling in-app purchases in your device’s settings.

By downloading Farm Heroes Saga you agree to our terms of service which can be found at https://king.com/termsAndConditions

Do not sell my data: King shares your personal information with advertising partners to personalize ads. Learn more at https://king.com/privacyPolicy. If you wish to exercise your Do Not Sell My Data rights, you can do so by contacting us via the in-game help center or by going to https://soporto.king.com/contact

Enjoy the amazing farm and match 3 puzzle game from King! Match 3 or more Cropsies in a variety of game modes and puzzles. Unlock animals and blast boosters as you solve the different match 3 puzzles.

Explore 1000’s of Levels
Acres of luscious levels and puzzles await you! Every two weeks, discover new puzzles, for a match 3 game in constant evolution!

Hero Mode
Time for a blast! Match as many Cropsies as you can before running out of moves. The higher the score, the more Magic Beans you gain to help you win the puzzle game.

Rancid Boss Battles
Defend your farm! Solve challenging matching puzzles and, with the help of the farm animals, keep the thief away from your fruit and plants.

Join the Farm Club
Recruit cute animals to help you solve puzzles! When matching is not enough anymore, call your animal friends to the rescue and blast powerful boosters to win the game.

Play with friends…
Team up with your friends to enhance your farming experience: chat, play with them and participate in events unique to Farm Teams. Who said the farming adventure had to be lonely?

…or compete with friends!
You think your farm is the best? The game is on! Compete in the leaderboard or in the Tractor Dash event to prove you’re the best at match 3 puzzle games.

title: Farm Heroes Saga

container.value:
King.com Limited
Aragon Business Centre, Level 4, Dragonara Road, St Julians STJ3140, Malta

creator: King
descriptionHtml:
Farm Heroes Saga, a match 3 game from the makers of Candy Crush Saga and Bubble Witch 3 Saga!

Farming has never been so fun! Jump into a farmtastic adventure: match and harvest the cute Cropsies across the farm to solve the match 3 puzzles! Go from puzzle to puzzle, matching fruit and plants, and level up to save the land from Rancid the Raccoon. Join forces with the Farm Heroes to swap, match, and harvest Cropsies. Ready to defend the Farm Lands?

Enjoy the amazing farm and match 3 puzzle game from King! Match 3 or more Cropsies in a variety of game modes and puzzles. Unlock animals and blast boosters as you solve the different match 3 puzzles.

Explore 1000’s of Farming Levels
Acres of luscious levels and puzzles await you! Every two weeks, discover new puzzles, for a match 3 game in constant evolution!

Hero Mode
Time for a blast! Match as many Cropsies as you can before running out of moves. The higher the score, the more Magic Beans you harvest to help you win the puzzle game.

Rancid Boss Battles
Defend your land! Solve challenging matching puzzles and, with the help of the farm animals, keep the thief away from your fruit and plants.

Join the Farm Club
Recruit cute animals to help you solve puzzles! When matching is not enough anymore, call your animal friends to the rescue and blast powerful boosters to win the game.

Play with friends…
Team up with your friends to enhance your farming experience: chat, play with them, and participate in events unique to Farm Teams. Who said the farming adventure had to be lonely?

…or crush the competition!
You think your farm is the best? The game is on! Compete in the leaderboard or in the Tractor Dash event to prove you’re the best at match 3 puzzle games.

Start matching and farming Cropsies today! But most importantly, have fun playing Farm Heroes Saga!

Visit https://community.king.com/en or contact us in game by going to Settings > Customer Care if you need help!

Farm Heroes Saga is free to play but optional in-game items such as extra moves or lives require payment. You can turn off the payment feature by disabling in-app purchases in your device’s settings.

By downloading Farm Heroes Saga you agree to our terms of service which can be found at https://king.com/termsAndConditions

Do not sell my data: King shares your personal information with advertising partners to personalize ads. Learn more at https://king.com/privacyPolicy. If you wish to exercise your Do Not Sell My Data rights, you can do so by contacting us via the in-game help center or by going to https://soporto.king.com/contact
descriptionShort: A match 3 farming puzzle game. Start matching to harvest & crush fruit cropsies!

King.com Limited

Remember to update to the latest version and get playing!

Aragon Business Centre, Level 4, Dragonara Road, St Julians STJ3140, Malta

creator: King
descriptionHtml:
From the makers of Candy Crush Saga: Farm Heroes Saga, the unique match 3 puzzle experience at the farm!

Jump into a farm-tastic game adventure: match and collect the cute fruit across the garden to solve the match 3 puzzles! Go from puzzle to puzzle, matching fruit, and save the farm from Rancid the Raccoon. Join forces with the Farm Heroes to match and collect Cropsies. Ready to master the Farm Lands?

Enjoy the original match 3 puzzle game from King! Look after the fruit and blast boosters to solve match 3 puzzles.

Master 1000’s of Levels
Acres of luscious puzzles await you! Every two weeks, discover new puzzles, for a match 3 game in constant evolution!

Rancid Boss Battles
Solve challenging match 3 puzzles and keep the thief away from your fruit with the help of the farm animals.

Farm with friends
Time for a blast! Team up with your friends and participate in events. Who said the match 3 adventure had to be lonely?

Join the Farm Club
Recruit cute animals to help you solve puzzles! When matching is not enough anymore, call your animal friends to the rescue and blast powerful boosters to win the match 3 game.

Have you completed the garden tour? Experience new match 3 puzzles in other King games: Candy Crush Saga and Pet Rescue Saga!

Visit https://community.king.com/en or contact us in game by going to Settings > Customer Care if you need help!

Farm Heroes Saga is free to play but optional in-game items such as extra moves or lives require payment. You can turn off the payment feature by disabling in-app purchases in your device’s settings.

By downloading Farm Heroes Saga you agree to our terms of service which can be found at https://king.com/termsAndConditions

Do not sell my data: King shares your personal information with advertising partners to personalize ads. Learn more at https://king.com/privacyPolicy. If you wish to exercise your Do Not Sell My Data rights, you can do so by contacting us via the in-game help center or by going to https://soporto.king.com/contact
descriptionShort: Defend your farm from Rancid the Raccoon! Match the fruit to save the Farm Lands

We have made some Croptastic improvements to Farm Heroes that will make your gaming experience even better! Cool, right?

Remember to update to the latest version and get playing!

Jump into a farm-tastic game adventure: match and collect the cute fruit across the garden to solve the match 3 puzzles! Go from puzzle to puzzle, matching fruit, and save the farm from Rancid the Raccoon. Join forces with the Farm Heroes to match and collect Cropsies. Ready to master the Farm Lands?

Enjoy the original match 3 puzzle game from King! Look after the fruit and blast boosters to solve match 3 puzzles.

Master 1000’s of Levels
Acres of luscious puzzles await you! Every two weeks, discover new puzzles, for a match 3 game in constant evolution!

Rancid Boss Battles
Solve challenging match 3 puzzles and keep the thief away from your fruit with the help of the farm animals.

Farm with friends
Time for a blast! Team up with your friends and participate in events. Who said the match 3 adventure had to be lonely?

Join the Farm Club
Recruit cute animals to help you solve puzzles! When matching is not enough anymore, call your animal friends to the rescue and blast powerful boosters to win the match 3 game.

Have you completed the garden tour? Experience new match 3 puzzles in other King games: Candy Crush Saga and Pet Rescue Saga!

Visit https://community.king.com/en or contact us in game by going to Settings > Customer Care if you need help!

Farm Heroes Saga is free to play but optional in-game items such as extra moves or lives require payment. You can turn off the payment feature by disabling in-app purchases in your device’s settings.

By downloading Farm Heroes Saga you agree to our terms of service which can be found at https://king.com/termsAndConditions

Do not sell my data: King shares your personal information with advertising partners to personalize ads. Learn more at https://king.com/privacyPolicy. If you wish to exercise your Do Not Sell My Data rights, you can do so by contacting us via the in-game help center or by going to https://soporto.king.com/contact

title:

6.56.23

container.value:
King.com Limited
Aragon Business Centre, Level 4, Dragonara Road, St Julians STJ3140, Malta

creator: King
descriptionHtml:
Farm Heroes Saga, a match 3 game from the makers of Candy Crush Saga and Bubble Witch 3 Saga!

Farming has never been so fun! Jump into a farmtastic adventure: match and harvest the cute Cropsies across the farm to solve the match 3 puzzles! Go from puzzle to puzzle, matching fruit and plants, and level up to save the land from Rancid the Raccoon. Join forces with the Farm Heroes to swap, match, and harvest Cropsies. Ready to defend the Farm Lands?

Enjoy the amazing farm and match 3 puzzle game from King! Match 3 or more Cropsies in a variety of game modes and puzzles. Unlock animals and blast boosters as you solve the different match 3 puzzles.

Explore 1000’s of Farming Levels
Acres of luscious levels and puzzles await you! Every two weeks, discover new puzzles, for a match 3 game in constant evolution!

Hero Mode
Time for a blast! Match as many Cropsies as you can before running out of moves. The higher the score, the more Magic Beans you harvest to help you win the puzzle game.

Rancid Boss Battles
Defend your land! Solve challenging matching puzzles and, with the help of the farm animals, keep the thief away from your fruit and plants.

Join the Farm Club
Recruit cute animals to help you solve puzzles! When matching is not enough anymore, call your animal friends to the rescue and blast powerful boosters to win the game.

Play with friends…
Team up with your friends to enhance your farming experience: chat, play with them, and participate in events unique to Farm Teams. Who said the farming adventure had to be lonely?

…or crush the competition!
You think your farm is the best? The game is on! Compete in the leaderboard or in the Tractor Dash event to prove you’re the best at match 3 puzzle games.

Start matching and farming Cropsies today! But most importantly, have fun playing Farm Heroes Saga!

Visit https://community.king.com/en or contact us in game by going to Settings > Customer Care if you need help!

Farm Heroes Saga is free to play but optional in-game items such as extra moves or lives require payment. You can turn off the payment feature by disabling in-app purchases in your device’s settings.

By downloading Farm Heroes Saga you agree to our terms of service which can be found at https://king.com/termsAndConditions

Do not sell my data: King shares your personal information with advertising partners to personalize ads. Learn more at https://king.com/privacyPolicy. If you wish to exercise your Do Not Sell My Data rights, you can do so by contacting us via the in-game help center or by going to https://soporto.king.com/contact
descriptionShort: A match 3 farming puzzle game. Start matching to harvest & crush fruit cropsies!

title:
Farm Heroes Saga
6.58.11

container.value:
King.com Limited
Aragon Business Centre, Level 4, Dragonara Road, St Julians STJ3140, Malta

creator: King
descriptionHtml:
Farm Heroes Saga, a match 3 game from the makers of Candy Crush Saga and Bubble Witch 3 Saga!

Farming has never been so fun! Jump into a farmtastic adventure: match and harvest the cute Cropsies across the farm to solve the match 3 puzzles! Go from puzzle to puzzle, matching fruit and plants, and level up to save the land from Rancid the Raccoon. Join forces with the Farm Heroes to swap, match, and harvest Cropsies. Ready to defend the Farm Lands?

Enjoy the amazing farm and match 3 puzzle game from King! Match 3 or more Cropsies in a variety of game modes and puzzles. Unlock animals and blast boosters as you solve the different match 3 puzzles.

Explore 1000’s of Farming Levels
Acres of luscious levels and puzzles await you! Every two weeks, discover new puzzles, for a match 3 game in constant evolution!

Hero Mode
Time for a blast! Match as many Cropsies as you can before running out of moves. The higher the score, the more Magic Beans you harvest to help you win the puzzle game.

Rancid Boss Battles
Defend your land! Solve challenging matching puzzles and, with the help of the farm animals, keep the thief away from your fruit and plants.

Join the Farm Club
Recruit cute animals to help you solve puzzles! When matching is not enough anymore, call your animal friends to the rescue and blast powerful boosters to win the game.

Play with friends…
Team up with your friends to enhance your farming experience: chat, play with them, and participate in events unique to Farm Teams. Who said the farming adventure had to be lonely?

…or crush the competition!
You think your farm is the best? The game is on! Compete in the leaderboard or in the Tractor Dash event to prove you’re the best at match 3 puzzle games.

Start matching and farming Cropsies today! But most importantly, have fun playing Farm Heroes Saga!

Visit https://community.king.com/en or contact us in game by going to Settings > Customer Care if you need help!

Farm Heroes Saga is free to play but optional in-game items such as extra moves or lives require payment. You can turn off the payment feature by disabling in-app purchases in your device’s settings.

By downloading Farm Heroes Saga you agree to our terms of service which can be found at https://king.com/termsAndConditions

Do not sell my data: King shares your personal information with advertising partners to personalize ads. Learn more at https://king.com/privacyPolicy. If you wish to exercise your Do Not Sell My Data rights, you can do so by contacting us via the in-game help center or by going to https://soporto.king.com/contact
descriptionShort: A match 3 farming puzzle game. Start matching to harvest & crush fruit cropsies!

Aragon Business Centre, Level 4, Dragonara Road, St Julians STJ3140, Malta

creator: King
descriptionHtml:
From the makers of Candy Crush Saga: Farm Heroes Saga, the unique match 3 puzzle experience at the farm!

Jump into a farm-tastic game adventure: match and collect the cute fruit across the garden to solve the match 3 puzzles! Go from puzzle to puzzle, matching fruit, and save the farm from Rancid the Raccoon. Join forces with the Farm Heroes to match and collect Cropsies. Ready to master the Farm Lands?

Enjoy the original match 3 puzzle game from King! Look after the fruit and blast boosters to solve match 3 puzzles.

Master 1000’s of Levels
Acres of luscious puzzles await you! Every two weeks, discover new puzzles, for a match 3 game in constant evolution!

Rancid Boss Battles
Solve challenging match 3 puzzles and keep the thief away from your fruit with the help of the farm animals.

Farm with friends
Time for a blast! Team up with your friends and participate in events. Who said the match 3 adventure had to be lonely?

Join the Farm Club
Recruit cute animals to help you solve puzzles! When matching is not enough anymore, call your animal friends to the rescue and blast powerful boosters to win the match 3 game.

Have you completed the garden tour? Experience new match 3 puzzles in other King games: Candy Crush Saga and Pet Rescue Saga!

Visit https://community.king.com/en or contact us in game by going to Settings > Customer Care if you need help!

Farm Heroes Saga is free to play but optional in-game items such as extra moves or lives require payment. You can turn off the payment feature by disabling in-app purchases in your device’s settings.

By downloading Farm Heroes Saga you agree to our terms of service which can be found at https://king.com/termsAndConditions

Do not sell my data: King shares your personal information with advertising partners to personalize ads. Learn more at https://king.com/privacyPolicy. If you wish to exercise your Do Not Sell My Data rights, you can do so by contacting us via the in-game help center or by going to https://soporto.king.com/contact

title:
Farm Heroes Saga
6.60.18

container.value:
King.com Limited
Aragon Business Centre, Level 4, Dragonara Road, St Julians STJ3140, Malta

creator: King
descriptionHtml:
Get ready for Farm Heroes Saga, the thrilling match-3 game by King, the makers of Candy Crush and Bubble Witch!

Farming has never been so fun! Jump into a farmtastic adventure: match and harvest the cute Cropsies across the farm to solve match-3 puzzle games! Go from puzzle to puzzle, matching fruit and plants, and level up to save the land from Rancid the Raccoon. Join forces with the Farm Heroes to swap, match, and harvest Cropsies. Ready to defend the Farm Lands in this epic saga?

Enjoy the amazing farm and free match-3 puzzle games from King! Match 3 or more Cropsies in a variety of game modes and puzzles. Unlock animals and blast boosters as you solve the different match 3 puzzles.

Explore 1000’s of Farming Levels
Dive into farm adventures with a puzzle waiting at every corner! New levels are added every two weeks, ensuring a match-3 game experience that’s always fresh and evolving.

Hero Mode
Ready for a blast? Match as many Cropsies as possible before you run out of moves. The higher your score, the more Magic Beans you’ll collect to help you conquer even the trickiest puzzle games.

Rancid Boss Battles
Defend your farm from Rancid the Racoon! Solve challenging match-3 puzzles and, with the help of farm animals, keep the thief away from your fruit and plants.

Join the Farm Club
Call in reinforcements! Recruit adorable animals to help you solve match-3 puzzle games. When matching alone isn’t enough, unleash powerful boosters with the help of your farm friends to secure your victory.

Start matching and farming Cropsies today for free! But most importantly, have fun solving puzzle games in Farm Heroes Saga!

Visit https://community.king.com/en or contact us in game by going to Settings > Customer Care if you need help!

Farm Heroes Saga is free to play but optional in-game items such as extra moves or lives require payment. You can turn off the payment feature by disabling in-app purchases in your device’s settings.

By downloading Farm Heroes Saga you agree to our terms of service which can be found at https://king.com/termsAndConditions

Do not sell my data: King shares your personal information with advertising partners to personalize ads. Learn more at https://king.com/privacyPolicy. If you wish to exercise your Do Not Sell My Data rights, you can do so by contacting us via the in-game help center or by going to https://soporto.king.com/contact
descriptionShort: Harvest cropsies, solve exciting puzzles, and embark on a fun farming adventure!

appDetails.developerAddress:
King.com Limited
Aragon Business Centre, Level 4, Dragonara Road, St Julians STJ3140, Malta
appDetails.recentChangesHtml: Come on down to the Farm for a fresh update! We’ve fixed some bugs and refined levels to give you our best gameplay yet.

container.value:

creator: King
descriptionHtml:
Get ready for a fruit-filled farming adventure in Farm Heroes Saga, the hit casual puzzle game by King, creators of the Candy Crush series!
Join millions of players across India and around the world as you match cropsies, blast through levels, and save the farm from the mischievous Rancid the Raccoon.

Fun, Free & Fruit-Filled Puzzle Gameplay
- Match fruits and veggies in exciting match-3 puzzles to collect cropsies and restore your farm.
- Trigger powerful blast effects by combining matching items in clever ways.
- Easy to pick up, fun to master, perfect for fans of casual farming games!

Thousands of Levels, Always Growing
- Explore over 9,000 levels with new stages added every two weeks!
- Unlock challenging puzzles with increasing difficulty and strategy.
- Enjoy rich puzzle adventures across fields, gardens, and magical farm lands.

Farm Friends & Special Features
- Get help from adorable farm animals and collect Magic Beans for extra boosts!
- Activate Hero Mode to rack up bonus points when you finish with moves to spare.
- Take part in special events like Tractor Dash and compete with friends to earn rewards.

Play Offline or Compete Online
- Whether you're connected or on the go, you can enjoy the game offline anytime.
- Sync your progress across devices when you're online with a King account.
- Join farm teams, chat with friends, and complete challenges together!

Daily Bonuses & Free Rewards
- Log in daily for free gifts, surprise bonuses, and seasonal events.
- Beat tough levels with the help of boosters, power-ups, and your farm animal buddies!

Download Farm Heroes Saga Today, it’s Completely Free!
Farm Heroes Saga is free to play, but optional in-game items are available for purchase. You can disable in-app purchases through your device settings.
